items.sentence: My parents don't like my girlfriend. They think that she's not good enough for me.
Tom didn't know where the hospital was, so he had to ask someone how to get there.
We got divorced three months ago and my ex-wife is already engaged to another man.
How did people sharpen their pencils before the invention of the pencil sharpener?
Yesterday, I went to work at eight in the morning and came home at eight at night.
I'm going to come home a little early. There isn't much work at the office anyway.
I liked the concert we went to last week better than the one we went to yesterday.
The reason that the report had so many mistakes was because I wrote it in a hurry.
After years of living on his own, Tom found it hard to adjust to living with Mary.
Tom was furious, but he tempered his language because there were children present.
